page.title: 06Barton Turf: Village & Farms
page.content:
06340322 BARTON TURF FARMS & PENNYGATE HAMLET A predominantly farming area - arable crops - corn, sugar beet, mustard, potatoes. A network of minor roads connects Neatishead, Barton Turf and the main Wroxham/Yarmouth (A1151) road. The hamlet of Pennygate is in the NE corner of the square.
06350322 BARTON TURN: VILLAGE, HALL, RIVER ANT A village in a farmland setting on the River Ant and surrounding fenland on the fringe of Barton Broad. The village has a general store and Barton Hall, with connecting roads to Neatishead and Pennygate.
